attributes.action: stop the process of changing cheshire into two separate single-tier councils
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A decision has been made to change Cheshire into two separate single-tier councils.  This would mean expensive costs and council jobs lost. businesses and tax payers have said that they would prefer an improved 2 tier system but this has fallen of deaf ears.  This petition is a call to stop the process of changing Cheshire into a two single-tier councils and have an improved two-tier system as we currently have.
